StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMediaCardDataById]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @MediaCardID uniqueiden..er = null ) AS
SELECT mc.*, case when mc2.MediaCardId is null then 0 else 1 end as NextFyCard FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].MediaCard mc LEFT JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].MediaCard mc2 on mc.MediaName = mc2.MediaName and mc2.FY = mc.FY + 1 WHERE mc.MediaCardId = @MediaCardID
